short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Markdown Support to Mindmeister Notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds markdown support to MindMeister notes.

All you have to do is add a note, click "advanced," click "switch to plain text," and enter your markdown text.  The first line of that note must be "MARKDOWN". For example:

MARKDOWN
# Header 1
## Header 2
* List item 1
* List item 2
